home_description: The space in the web of Juan Pablo Jiménez, where he showcases his works, experiments, and projects related to web development. A space where you can get to know better who is Juan Pablo Jiménez, frontend and creative developer. From Medellín to the world!
home_title_og: Juan Pablo Jiménez | Frontend Developer & Creative Engineer | React Next.js TypeScript
first_section_text_1: Hello there! welcome to my little space in the web, here I showcase my works, experiments and projects related to web development. Right now am experiencing with animations and transitions effects to create a more profound experience.
first_section_text_2: I am a software engineer based in Medellín, Colombia, driven by a constant passion for creation and improvement. I am enthusiastic about technology and always eager to embrace new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.
second_section_text_1: I have been working as a Software Engineer with expertise in React, NextJS, and TypeScript, at Globant and now at Gorilla Logic, contributing to large-scale web applications with a strong focus on microfrontend architecture.
second_section_text_2: I’ve led the migration of legacy systems, removing deprecated technologies, and implemented accessibility standards (WCAG AA/AAA) and RTL support for internationalization. I also collaborated using AI-assisted workflows with Cursor to iterate on component design and improve development efficiency.

cookies.message: This site uses cookies to analyze web traffic. Do you accept the use of cookies?
